name: CLKComplicationTemplateUtilitarianSmallFlat
desc: A template for displaying an image and text in a single line.

items.name: init(textProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has a single line of text.

items.name: init(textProvider: CLKTextProvider, imageProvider: CLKImageProvider?)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has a single row with an image and a line of text.
